module.name: Outbound Route Permissions
module.changelog: *0.3.1.0* Inserts ROUTENAME into routes so core does not have to *0.3.0.0* Added ability to redirect back with a prefix, added 'fail' destination. *0.2.0.0* Fixed bug with routenames not being displayed properly if they contained a hyphen *0.1.0.0* Original Release
module.description: Allows you to block access to various routes, on a per-extension basis. Note that this module requires a database to be available AT ALL TIMES.
